void worldToVehicle ( const Vector3 &  vehiclePos,
const float *  pVehicleAuxVolatile,
Vector3 &  pos,
float &  yaw 
)

This helper function transforms a point in the coordinate system of world space into the coordinate system used by passengers that have us as their vehicle.

In : vehicle pos / vehicle aux volatile[3] In/Out: world pos -> vehicle relative pos In/Out: world yaw -> vehicle relative yaw
